p: GPC measurements were carried out in a a model 1515 (Waters, Milford, CT, USA), with two polystyrene divinylbenzene columns (PSDVB) coupled in series (TSK Gel 1000 and Styragel 100). The parameters of the GPC were: 0.8 mL·min−1, pressure range from 860 to 1100 bar, column oven (PE003—HPLC/GPC—Watters), and detector (Refraction index—Watters 2414) in isothermal conditions, at 40 °C.
